title: Pixel 4a dropping mobile data connection
content:
Hi guys

Had my pixel 4a for 2 or 3 weeks. For the past 3 days my mobile data randomly stops working and the "LTE" icon dissappears and displays no mobile data connection. When I pull down the notification tray it shows that mobile data is still switched on and displays a "H" underneath the icon.

When this happens I lose all mobile data connection, 3G&2G included. I've spoken to my mobile provider and they have looked into it and are adament its nothing on their end and its the device itself.

When this happens I've tried turning off mobile data for a few minutes and turning back on, then on airplane mode for a few minutes and turn back off and restart the phone and nothing helps.

Is anyone else experiencing this? Any idea how to fix?

Thanks in advance
